works.description:
My original mixed media artwork  
entitled "Burden" and my original blog post from my blog were stolen and  
placed on the blog of "Picture Unique Arts" where there is offensive  
content and partial nudity.  My words, my blog post and title and my  
artwork were copied word for word and placed on their blog as if they
wrote  
it and made the art.  I don't want my artwork associated with such a foul 

site, please help!
***I can see that they are doing this to others as well to drive people to
 
their nasty site.
